channel.title: Setting My Classpath for C++
channel.description:
I made another topic in "questions", but I was told to post here, so Mods or Admins can deleate my other topic.
But anyways, I have finnally took the first step for programming my game, and I started codeing some stuff in C++, but my compiler says I need to set my Classpath for C++ (It is set for Java right now), and I cannot make anything if I cannot compile it ;D Any Help is appreciated!

item.title: Setting My Classpath for C++

I made another topic in “questions”, but I was told to post here, so Mods or Admins can deleate my other topic.
